steps.prompt: At the town book festival, Mia met the ______ who signed her story.  (Word bank: author, astronaut, autumn, applaud)
When the writer finished reading, the crowd began to ______ loudly.  (Word bank: author, astronaut, autumn, applaud)
By ______, the leaves outside the library had turned red and gold.  (Word bank: author, astronaut, autumn, applaud)
